title: Implementing K-Means Clustering in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will explore the k-means clustering algorithm in JavaScript. The purpose of this lab is to learn how to group data into k clusters based on similarity, using the k-means algorithm. We will implement the algorithm step-by-step and apply it to a sample dataset to understand how it works.

meta.title: Implementing K-Means Clustering in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to group data into k clusters using the k-means clustering algorithm in JavaScript.
meta.keywords: javascript, machine learning, data clustering, javascript practice, javascript practice online, javascript lab, k means clustering, javascript tutor, data analysis

verify.name: Verify Node Commands in ZSH History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
